jupyter: python3

```{python}

raw_doc = "CV_doc"
updated_doc = 'CV_updated'

f = open(f"{raw_doc}.md", "r")
raw = f.read()
raw = raw.split('---',2)[-1]

names_list = ['Skeeter, J.']

for name in names_list:
  raw = raw.replace(name,f'**{name}**')

pdf_link = '''
::: {.content-visible when-format="html"}

'''+f'View the .pdf version [here]({updated_doc}.pdf)'+'''

:::
'''

raw = pdf_link + raw

with open(f"{updated_doc}.qmd", "r") as f:

  updated = f.read()
  updated = updated.split('---',2)[1]
  updated = '---' + updated + '---\n' + raw

with open(f"{updated_doc}.qmd", "w+") as f: 

  f.write(updated)

```
